grapher 0.1.0

Change Dimensions

change_dimensions.Rd

Change the dimensions of the graph.

change_dimensions(g, is_3d = FALSE)

Arguments

g

An object of class graph as returned by graph or a graph_proxy as returned by a function of the same name.
is_3d

Whether to plot in 3 dimensions or 2 dimensions.

Examples

library(shiny)

N <- 500
graph_data <- make_data(N)

ui <- fluidPage(
  radioButtons("dims", "Dimensions", choices = list("3D" = TRUE, "2D" = FALSE)),
  graphOutput("graph")
)

server <- function(input, output) {

  output$graph <- renderGraph({
    graph_data %>%
      graph() %>%
      graph_live_layout(time_step = 5)
  })

  observeEvent(input$dims, {
    graph_proxy("graph") %>%
      change_dimensions(input$dims)
  })

}
# NOT RUN {
shinyApp(ui, server)
# }
